allow:
Bash(git commit -m "$\(cat <<''EOF''
TotalAssist rebrand with full monetization system

## Brand & UI
- Rebrand from TechTriage to TotalAssist \(platform\) + Scout \(AI persona\)
- Dark theme throughout \(midnight color palette\)
- New logos: total_assist_logo.png, scout_logo.png
- Improved button/icon contrast and accessibility

## Pricing & Tiers
- Scout Free: 5 chat/month, 1 photo/month, voice/video locked
- Scout Home \($9.99/mo\): Unlimited chat/photo/voice, 1 video credit/week
- Scout Pro \($19.99/mo\): Everything unlimited, 15 video credits/month, premium AI

## Monetization System \(usageStore\)
- Tier-based usage tracking with monthly/weekly resets
- Video credits system with weekly reset \(Home\) / monthly reset \(Pro\)
- Ad-hoc credit purchases \($5/1 credit, $12/3 pack\)
- Signup gate for guests, upgrade gate for free users
- RefillCreditsModal for paid users who exhaust credits

## New Components
- UpgradeModal, SignupGateModal, RefillCreditsModal
- ForgotPassword, ResetPassword flows
- DiagnosticReport for video analysis output
- UsageMeter in Dashboard sidebar

## Features
- Scout Chat, Scout Snapshot, Scout Signal \(voice\), Video Diagnostic
- 4 features displayed on Pricing and HowItWorks pages
- FAQ section for each feature including Scout Signal
- Markdown rendering in chat widget

## Infrastructure
- Added INFRASTRUCTURE_SETUP.md with full deployment guide
- Supabase, Google OAuth, Resend, Stripe setup instructions

Co-Authored-By: Claude Opus 4.5 <noreply@anthropic.com>
EOF
\)")

Bash(HOME_USER_ID="7a4d78d0-7e00-4945-8944-57f316523841" __NEW_LINE_c6b69e139169bc8e__ echo "=== Step 3: Test saving a chat session ===" curl -s -X POST http://localhost:5000/api/sessions -H "Content-Type: application/json" -b /tmp/home_cookies.txt -d "{
    ""userId"": ""$HOME_USER_ID"",
    ""sessionType"": ""chat"",
    ""title"": ""UAT Test - Router Issue"",
    ""summary"": ""User had trouble with router lights blinking"",
    ""transcript"": [{""role"": ""user"", ""text"": ""My router has a blinking red light"", ""timestamp"": 1234567890}]
  }" __NEW_LINE_c6b69e139169bc8e__ echo "" echo "" __NEW_LINE_c6b69e139169bc8e__ echo "=== Step 4: Check session was saved ===" curl -s "http://localhost:5000/api/sessions/$HOME_USER_ID" __NEW_LINE_c6b69e139169bc8e__ echo "" echo "" __NEW_LINE_c6b69e139169bc8e__ echo "=== Step 5: Check usage was incremented ===" curl -s "http://localhost:5000/api/subscription/status/$HOME_USER_ID")
Bash(__NEW_LINE_eb23710d376ffe37__ echo "=== UAT TEST: PRO TIER ===")
Bash(__NEW_LINE_eb23710d376ffe37__ echo "Step 1: Check Pro tier subscription status")
Bash(__NEW_LINE_eb23710d376ffe37__ echo "Step 2: Login as Pro user")
Bash(__NEW_LINE_eb23710d376ffe37__ echo "Step 3: Save multiple chat sessions")
Bash(__NEW_LINE_eb23710d376ffe37__ echo "Step 4: Save multiple photo sessions")

Bash(__NEW_LINE_eb23710d376ffe37__ echo "Step 6: Check Pro subscription status and usage")

Bash(git -C /home/runner/workspace add src/components/ChatWidget.tsx src/components/Dashboard.tsx src/components/FAQ.tsx src/components/Pricing.tsx src/components/TermsOfService.tsx src/components/UpgradeModal.tsx src/components/scout/GuidedActions.tsx src/components/scout/ScoutChatScreen.tsx src/components/scout/ScoutInfoPanel.tsx src/App.tsx)

Bash(git -C /home/runner/workspace commit -m "$\(cat <<''EOF''
UX polish: hero parallax, welcome modal, response timing, step nav, copy audit

- Hero section: multi-layer scroll parallax \(bg images, staggered text, orbs\),
  opacity fade on scroll, fixed mobile content positioning, removed desktop
  height cap so hero fills viewport
- Welcome banner converted to centered modal overlay with single clear CTA
- Agent response timing now scales by message length \(2-8s\) instead of
  fixed 1.2-2s delay
- StepCard guided fix engine: added "Done, next step" and "Go back"
  navigation pills on the most recent step
- Noise texture added to pricing cards and dashboard help tiles
- Pricing card text shadows for readability over noise
- Trust badge visibility improved \(larger text, stronger color\)
- Site-wide copy audit: removed outdated product names \(Snapshot, Signal,
  Text Support\), phantom features \($100 onsite credit, premium AI, human
  specialists\), and stale "coming soon" claims across FAQ, Pricing,
  ChatWidget, UpgradeModal, TermsOfService, and ScoutInfoPanel

Co-Authored-By: Claude Opus 4.6 <noreply@anthropic.com>
EOF
\)")

Bash(git -C /home/runner/workspace commit -m "$\(cat <<''EOF''
Feature prominence: differentiator section, pricing parity, competitor FAQ

- Replace WhyTotalAssist section with 3 differentiator cards highlighting
  unique value props: photo/video diagnostics \("See It, Don't Explain It""\),
  guided assist pills \(""Tap, Don't Type"\), and PDF case reports
  \("A Repair Record, Not Just a Chat"\)
- Equal-height pricing cards via flex-col + flex-1 on feature lists
- Add Assist Pills and PDF Reports to all tier feature lists and
  feature comparison table \(2 new rows\)
- Add "Why not just use ChatGPT or Google Gemini?" FAQ to both
  FAQ page \(Getting Started\) and Pricing page
- Fix stale homepage FAQ pricing \(was "Basic/Pro $20/Premium $199",
  now correct Free/Home $9.99/Pro $19.99\)

Co-Authored-By: Claude Opus 4.6 <noreply@anthropic.com>
EOF
\)")

Bash(git -C /home/runner/workspace commit -m "$\(cat <<''EOF''
Realistic agent connection flow: 5-10s delay before technician joins

- Replace instant agent greeting with neutral welcome prompt that
  requires user interaction before connecting
- On first message: show "Connecting you with a support technician..."
  for 5-10 seconds \(randomized\) while API call runs in parallel
- After connection delay, show "{Agent} has connected to your session"
  message, then 1.5s pause before displaying the actual response
- Subsequent messages use existing length-based response timing
- Skip connection flow when reopening existing cases \(initialCaseId\)

Co-Authored-By: Claude Opus 4.6 <noreply@anthropic.com>
EOF
\)")
